contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox University |name = North China University of Technology |native_name = 北方工业大学 |image_name = |image_size = |caption = |latin_name = |motto = |mottoeng = |established = 1946 |closed = |type = [[National university]] |affiliation = |endowment = |officer_in_charge = |chairman = |chancellor = |president = 王晓纯 |vice-president = |superintendent = |provost = |vice_chancellor = |rector = |principal = |dean = |director = |head_label = |head = |faculty = |staff = 550 |students = 13000 |undergrad = 9400 |postgrad = 1000 |doctoral = |other = |city = [[Beijing]] |state = |province = |country = {{PRC}} |coor = |campus = [[Urban area|urban]]: [[Shijingshan District]] |former_names = |free_label = |free = |sports = |colors = |colours = |nickname = |mascot = |athletics = |affiliations = |website = [http://www.ncut.edu.cn North China University of Technology Official website] |logo = |footnotes = }} '''North China University of Technology''' ({{zh|s=北方工业大学|t=北方工業大學|p=běifāng gōngyè dàxué}}) is a university in [[Shijingshan District]], Western [[Beijing]], [[People's Republic of China]]. North China University of Technology has 9 colleges, 30 majors, 12 teaching and experimental center, and 9 research and design institute. ==External links== *[http://www.ncut.edu.cn North China University of Technology Official website] {{Universities and colleges in Beijing}} {{coord missing|Beijing}} {{DEFAULTSORT:North China University Of Technology}} [[Category:Universities and colleges in Beijing]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 1946]] [[Category:1946 establishments in China]] {{China-university-stub}}
